testcase.name: gradle properties tuning keys are present()

failure.message: org.gradle.internal.exceptions.DefaultMultiCauseException: Multiple Failures (3 failures) org.opentest4j.AssertionFailedError: Expected org.gradle.jvmargs in README properties ==> expected: <true> but was: <false> org.opentest4j.AssertionFailedError: Expected org.gradle.parallel=true ==> expected: <true> but was: <false> org.opentest4j.AssertionFailedError: Expected org.gradle.caching=true ==> expected: <true> but was: <false>
